name: Warhawk Reborn
description: Warhawk Reborn enables you to play Warhawk for PS3 again after the server shutdown in 2019. It uses the LAN-Mode and publishes public servers.  NOTE: You still need a valid copy of the game on a real PS3. You can buy one in retail or online for less than a dollar if you need to. The digital version will work fine as well.
